mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, title, contents, mem_no) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title }, #{contents }, #{mem_no })
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, title, written_time, answer FROM board WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC
